prompt: Review my Resume and Cover Letter in my Google Docs. Identify key achievements and strengths and suggest a revised LinkedIn profile summary and headline tailored to my target role. Recommend 3 YouTube tutorials on personal branding for LinkedIn.
comment: From godofprompt.ai guide — trending because Gemini's Docs integration enables quick, personalized profile revamps.

prompt: Analyze my Gmail for conversations labeled 'B2B Prospects' from the last 3 months. Rank threads by engagement and industry relevance, extract next-step recommendations, and draft prioritized follow-up messages.
comment: Popular sales workflow prompt from the godofprompt.ai list that leverages Gmail scanning to improve outreach.

prompt: Summarize this email thread and extract all action items, assigned owners, and deadlines in bullet points.
comment: Tom's Guide daily-use prompt — trending for rapidly catching up on long email chains and getting clear actionables.

prompt: Look at this photo of my pantry (uploaded) and create three balanced dinner recipes using only the visible ingredients. For each recipe include missing-ingredient shopping list and estimated prep/cook time.
comment: Highlighted by Tom's Guide as a high-value visual-analysis prompt that turns images into practical meal plans.

prompt: Act as a career coach: review the pasted resume and LinkedIn summary, list strengths and weaknesses, propose 3 tailored career paths, and give a 90-day action plan plus a concise cover letter for each path.
comment: Combines role-play and structured guidance trends (featured across user guides) for actionable career planning.

prompt: Create a project timeline for '[project name]' with 8 key milestones, deadlines, dependencies, owners, and a short risk mitigation plan for each milestone.
comment: ClickUp's productivity prompts are trending for project managers who want fast, structured timelines and risk analysis.

prompt: Rewrite the pasted paragraph in a more persuasive and concise tone for LinkedIn; preserve accomplishments and produce 3 alternative headline options.
comment: Common ClickUp prompt for polishing professional copy and headlines to boost engagement.

prompt: Brainstorm 10 creative blog post ideas about [topic] for [target audience]; for each idea provide a short outline, suggested headline, and 2 SEO keywords.
comment: ClickUp's content-generation prompts are trending among marketers for fast idea-to-outline workflows.

prompt: Convert these unorganized trip notes into a structured itinerary table with dates, times, booking links, estimated costs, and a packing checklist.
comment: Inspired by the Gemini API prompt gallery (trip recommendations) — trending for rapid travel planning and table structuring.

prompt: Teach me quadratic equations: give a concise lesson, 5 practice problems of increasing difficulty, step-by-step solutions, and a short study plan to master the topic.
comment: From the Gemini API prompt gallery 'Math Tutor' example — trending among educators and learners for interactive lessons and practice sets.

prompt: Review my Resume and Cover Letter in my Google Docs. Identify key achievements and strengths; suggest a revised LinkedIn profile summary and headline tailored to [industry]; recommend YouTube tutorials on personal branding to improve my online presence.
comment: Popular business prompt for LinkedIn/profile optimization; inspired by godofprompt.ai's Gemini examples.

prompt: Analyze my Gmail labeled 'B2B Prospects' from the last 3 months. Rank conversations by engagement and industry relevance, extract key insights, and provide prioritized follow-up templates.
comment: Trending for sales teams to prioritize leads and action items; based on examples in the godofprompt.ai guide.

prompt: Scan my Gmail for customer emails from the last week. Summarize each thread, prioritize by urgency and business impact, and draft suggested replies for the top three.
comment: Email triage and reply-drafting is a high-value daily workflow highlighted by Tom's Guide.

prompt: Create a project timeline for [project name] with [N] key milestones, deadlines, dependencies, resource assignments, and a short risk mitigation plan.
comment: Productivity staple from ClickUp's prompt list; widely used to standardize project planning.

prompt: Give me 10 blog post ideas about [topic] for [target audience], provide suggested headlines and primary keywords, and include a 300-word outline for the top idea.
comment: High-demand content marketing prompt for idea generation and SEO-focused outlines; popular in ClickUp's recommendations.

prompt: Rewrite the following text: [paste text]. Convert it to a [professional/casual/persuasive] tone suitable for [platform], shorten to X% length, and produce a 2-line subject/preview.
comment: Common content polishing prompt for adapting tone and length across channels; recommended in productivity guides.

prompt: Act as an expert [role, e.g., career coach/marketing consultant]. Based on this situation [describe], give structured advice and a 6-week action plan with measurable milestones.
comment: Role-playing prompts provide personalized, actionable plans; frequently cited by Tom's Guide users.

prompt: Convert this natural-language constraint into a regular expression: [describe pattern]. Provide the regex, a brief explanation, and 5 example test strings (matches and non-matches).
comment: Developer-focused prompt from the Gemini API prompt gallery; trending for fast regex generation and explanations.

prompt: Given this Python function [paste code], generate comprehensive unit tests covering edge cases, list its time complexity, and suggest targeted optimizations to improve performance.
comment: From the Gemini API cookbook — popular among developers for rapid test generation and complexity analysis.

prompt: Translate this document [paste text] into [language], preserve the requested formality level ([formal/informal]), localize idioms, and note any cultural considerations or alternate phrasings.
comment: Widely used localization/translation prompt for professional documents; highlighted in productivity prompt collections.

prompt: Review my 'Resume' and 'Cover Letter' in my @docs. Identify key achievements and strengths, suggest a revised LinkedIn summary and headline, and propose three tailored interview talking points.
comment: From GodOfPrompt guide — popular for job seekers using Gemini's Docs integration.

prompt: Summarize all mentions of educational or course-related expenses in my @gmail for the past year and provide an analysis of spending efficiency with recommendations to reallocate budget.
comment: Example from GodOfPrompt showing Gmail analysis — trending for personal finance and learning ROI.

prompt: Analyze conversations labeled 'B2B Prospects' in my @gmail over the last 3 months. Rank by engagement and industry relevance, flag high-priority leads, and recommend follow-up messages.
comment: Trending for sales teams — pulls insights from Gmail to prioritize outreach.

prompt: Convert these unorganized trip notes and receipts into a structured itinerary and expense table (date, activity, location, cost). Highlight scheduling conflicts and suggest optimizations.
comment: Inspired by Google AI prompt gallery (trip recommendations / table conversion) — useful for travel planning and RAG workflows.

prompt: Give me 10 blog post ideas about [topic] tailored to [target audience], then outline a 500-word draft for the top idea with SEO keywords and a meta description.
comment: ClickUp's content/productivity prompts — widely used to speed content planning and writing.

prompt: Look at this photo of my pantry [upload image] and create three balanced dinner recipes using only items shown; include full recipes and a shopping list for missing ingredients.
comment: Tom's Guide favorite — practical multimodal prompt turning pantry images into meal plans.

prompt: Recreate this pet photo as a 16-bit video game character and place it into a 2D platform level; keep the pet's likeness and suggest character stats and abilities.
comment: From Google's Nano Banana examples — trending for creative image-to-concept transformations.

prompt: Remove distracting elements from this photo (e.g., fences) and change ambient lighting to 'evening' while preserving natural skin tones and realistic shadows.
comment: Demo-style Nano Banana edit from YouTube — popular for quick, high-quality photo retouches.

prompt: Merge these two images seamlessly: insert the hand holding a coffee cup into the foreground of the landscape photo; match lighting, shadows, and color grading; provide a step-by-step edit log.
comment: Mashable-recommended compositing prompt — trending for advanced image merges that require realistic lighting.

prompt: Summarize the key points from this long email thread and draft a concise reply that addresses outstanding questions and next steps, with two suggested subject-line options.
comment: Common daily-use prompt (noted in reviews) — saves time catching up and replying to long email chains.
